metadata.title: Adenovirus-mediated expression of CXCL10 in the central nervous system results in T-cell recruitment and limited neuropathology

abstract.original_text: is not sufficient to induce pathology within the CNS and that additional signals other than CXCL10 are required for induction of an immune-mediated neurologic disease. Journal of NeuroVirology (2003) 9, 315-324.

sentences.segment_text: is not sufficient to induce pathology within the CNS and that additional signals other than CXCL10 are required for induction of an immune-mediated neurologic disease .
